title: BOOTLEGGER'S DRIVE-IN SATURDAY NIGHT: THE TERROR & DEMENTIA 13

sources.title: BOOTLEGGER'S DRIVE-IN SATURDAY NIGHT: THE TERROR & DEMENTIA 13
sources.description: A COMPLETE DVD. Features a custom menu with either poster art or a still photo from one of the movies. Real easy to burn: Download the zipped folder, open it, extract the VIDEO_TS folder. Grab a blank disc and burn the VIDEO TS folder onto it. This DVD features, yeah, another Roger Corman double-bill, THE TERROR & DEMENTIA 13, along with the preview and intermission reels. Enjoy the show!
